successes.title: The Standards Manual
successes.description: The full-size reissue of the 1970 New York City Transit Authority Graphics Standards Manual, by Unimark's Massimo Vignelli and Bob Noorda.This limited edition project was available only on Kickstarter.

Pledges.description: Underground Access. For virtually the cost of a New York City subway fare, become a supporter and receive all project updates and backer-exclusive behind the scenes materials.
One copy of the Standards Manual reissue. Includes shipping in the contiguous US.
